comments:
Caused by: org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.exception.OpenFailureException: IWAE0006E Archive is not a valid WAR File because the deployment descriptor can not be found (case sensitive): WEB-INF/web.xml 


Exporting an project as *.war File failed because of this error. The web.xml is in Folder WEB-INF (so everything is right)...
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

I got the same error using Eclipse 3.2 when trying to export a war file that is using Facelets.  Are you using Facelets?
